() => {
  const data = [
    {
      id: '1',
      calendarId: '123',
      recurrenceId: '0',
      title: 'month 1',
      start: dayjs()
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      end: dayjs()
        .add(1, 'day')
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      isAllDay: false,
      location: 'hshdh',
      attendees: [],
      color: '#000',
      bgColor: 'skyblue',
      borderColor: '#00a9ff',
      customStyle: '',
      state: '1',
      raw: {},
    },
    {
      id: '2',
      calendarId: '123',
      recurrenceId: '0',
      title: 'month 2',
      start: dayjs()
        .hour(8)
        .unix(),
      end: dayjs()
        .endOf('day')
        .unix(),
      isAllDay: false,
      location: 'Âú∞ÁÇπ',
      attendees: [],
      color: '#000',
      bgColor: 'skyblue',
      borderColor: '#00a9ff',
      customStyle: '',
      state: '1',
      raw: {},
    },
  ]
  return <DayCalendar date={dayjs()} isWhichHour={'24'} schedules={data} />
}

() => {
  const data = [
    {
      id: '1',
      calendarId: '123',
      recurrenceId: '0',
      title: 'month 1',
      start: dayjs()
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      end: dayjs()
        .add(1, 'day')
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      isAllDay: false,
      location: 'hshdh',
      attendees: [],
      color: '#000',
      bgColor: 'skyblue',
      borderColor: '#00a9ff',
      customStyle: '',
      state: '1',
      raw: {},
    },
    {
      id: '2',
      calendarId: '123',
      recurrenceId: '0',
      title: 'month 2',
      start: dayjs()
        .add(3, 'day')
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      end: dayjs()
        .add(4, 'day')
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      isAllDay: false,
      location: 'hshdh',
      attendees: [],
      color: '#000',
      bgColor: 'skyblue',
      borderColor: '#00a9ff',
      customStyle: '',
      state: '1',
      raw: {},
    },
  ]
  return (
    <Calendar
      date={dayjs()}
      viewType={'week'}
      isWhichHour={'24'}
      schedules={data}
    />
  )
}

() => {
  const data = [
    {
      id: '1',
      calendarId: '123',
      recurrenceId: '0',
      title: 'month 1',
      start: dayjs()
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      end: dayjs()
        .add(1, 'day')
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      isAllDay: false,
      location: 'hshdh',
      attendees: [],
      color: '#000',
      bgColor: 'skyblue',
      borderColor: '#00a9ff',
      customStyle: '',
      state: '1',
      raw: {},
    },
    {
      id: '2',
      calendarId: '123',
      recurrenceId: '0',
      title: 'month 2',
      start: dayjs()
        .add(3, 'day')
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      end: dayjs()
        .add(4, 'day')
        .startOf('day')
        .unix(),
      isAllDay: false,
      location: 'hshdh',
      attendees: [],
      color: '#000',
      bgColor: 'skyblue',
      borderColor: '#00a9ff',
      customStyle: '',
      state: '1',
      raw: {},
    },
  ]
  return (
    <MonthCalendar
      date={dayjs()}
      viewType={'week'}
      isWhichHour={'24'}
      schedules={data}
      isVisibleSolar2lunar={true}
    />
  )
}
